mapper.select: select no, name from ${db}.option where type="size"
select no, name from ${db}.option where type="color"

select a.itemNo, a.stock, a.color, b.size from (select s.no as first_no, item_no as itemNo, name as color, stock from mall.stock s, mall.option o where s.item_no=#{no} and type="color" and o.no = s.first_option) a, (select s.no as second_no, item_no as itemNo, name as size, stock from mall.stock s, mall.option o where s.item_no=#{no} and type="size" and o.no = s.second_option) b where first_no = second_no;
select no, name, type from ${db}.option where name=#{name}
select no, name, type from ${db}.option where no=#{no}
